an10.220:4.1: * Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.220:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an10.220:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.220:4.5: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti?
an10.220:4.6: “Adhammacariyāvisamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
an10.220:5.1: “Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti?
an10.220:5.2: “Dhammacariyāsamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
an10.220:6.1: “Na kho ahaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
an10.220:6.2: Sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathāhaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājāneyyan”ti.
an10.220:6.3: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi;
an10.220:6.5: “Evaṃ, bho”ti kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi.
an10.220:8.1: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti … pe …
an10.220:8.2: evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena adhammacariyā visamacariyā hoti.

an10.220:15.1: “Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe …
an10.220:15.2: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
